sourcesContent:
import React, {useLayoutEffect} from 'react' import BH from '../../../../assets/img/home/bh.jpg' import Card from "../cards/card"; import {gsap} from "gsap"; import {ScrollTrigger} from 'gsap/ScrollTrigger' function Contact() { useLayoutEffect(() => { gsap.registerPlugin(ScrollTrigger); gsap.to('#contact', { y: 0, opacity: 1, scrollTrigger: { // markers: true, trigger: '#div-sec-oculos', start: '-460px', end: '20px', scrub: true, }, }) return () => { gsap.killTweensOf('.guarda-chuva') } }, []) return (<>

Contate-nos

Whatever cardigan tote bag tumblr hexagon brooklyn asymmetrical gentrify.

) } export default Contact;
